text: 13.22: Mt 6.19-34; Ru 12.16-21; 1 T 6.9-10; 6.17Mba tari ki karɨgi ki nuianeŋ ga regi wit vhɨgi, nta kha khesharigi gumgi gu mbigi ma. Mbe Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ mbararagi, mbe kha nuianan bigi ga nzuav thagine mbui ndɨkndɨk kɨvgia mben ki. Mbe kha nuianan bigi vhɨrve kɨrgeŋ vuzvugi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, mba ndɨkndɨgi kɨvgia zav Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ mbevigim, Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ mba ti fhu.
